for i in range(input()):
    n=raw_input()
    def paln(str):
        if str==str[::-1]:
            return True
        else:
            return False
    def pang(str):
        L=[]
        for i in range(len(str)):
            if str[i].isalpha() and str[i].lower() not in L:
                L.append(str[i].lower())
        if len(L)==26:
            return True
        else:
            return False
    if paln(n) and pang(n):
        print "palingram"
    elif paln(n):
        print "palindrome"
    elif pang(n):
        print "pangram"
    else:
        print "none"
